“Burning Acts: Injurious Speech” (Chapter 10) copyright © 1995 by JudithButler.
“At the Planchette of Deconstruction is/in America” (Chapter 15) copyright ©1995 by Gayatri Chakravorty Spivak.
“Burning Acts: Injurious Speech” (Chapter 10) also appears in Performance andPerformativity, Andrew Parker and Eve Kosofsky Sedgwick, eds. (Routledge,1994).
“The Disputed Ground: Deconstruction and Literary Studies” (Chapter 4), by J.Hillis Miller, draws upon parts of an earlier essay, “Is Deconstruction anAestheticism?”, which was published in Nineteenth-Century Prose, vol. 20, no.2(fall 1993), pp. 23–41. Permission to reprint is gratefully acknowledged.
